abilitiesRevealed.description: A Gear Third technique enhanced with Armament Haki. Luffy inflates his arm to giant size and coats it with Haki, creating a black giant fist that delivers a devastating punch with enhanced power and snapback force.
abilitiesRevealed.demonstration: Luffy used it to defeat Franky who was in Chopper's Monster Point form.

abilitiesRevealed.description: Law places his hands (or thumbs) on an opponent and releases an extremely powerful electrical current similar to a defibrillator, neutralizing the opponent with a devastating shock.
abilitiesRevealed.demonstration: Law used Counter Shock to defeat Scotch of the Yeti Cool Brothers after slicing him in half.

weaknesses: Drains stamina with extended Room use
